name: Simple Dark WileyPlus
description: A simple Dark Mode for Wiley Plus. Easier on the eyes while staring at problems late into the night.
additional_info: Release: 0.2B - Added support for assignment selection screen and changes main nav bar - Link color tweaks Will fix and update for the full site in the next few weeks. Keywords: wileyplus, physics, school, education, firefox, minimal, flat, dark, black, chrome, style, dark.
